short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visual help for the Build App - Prompt filter on mage.space. Note: Requires 1280px window width.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I designed the Prompt Filter Helper plugin to provide visual help for mage.space filters.

Ease of Use: The extension offers an intuitive interface that makes it easy to apply and manage prompt filters.
Enhanced Visuals: It provides clear visual cues and assistance, helping you to quickly understand and utilize the available filters.
